formula: G.f.: (1-sqrt(1-8*x+12*x^2+12*x^3))/2. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 08, 2000.Recurrence: n*a(n) = 4*(2*n-3)*a(n-1) - 12*(n-3)*a(n-2) - 6*(2*n-9)*a(n-3). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015
mathematica: nmax = 30; aa = ConstantArray[0,nmax]; aa[[1]] = 2; aa[[2]] = 1; aa[[3]] = 1; Do[aa[[n]] = Sum[aa[[k]] * aa[[n-k]],{k,1,n-1}],{n,4,nmax}]; aa (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
